text: Kenneth John McNaught (22 April 1913 – 17 May 1999)Background notes on The Roll of Distinguished Philatelists September 2011, Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Trust, London, 2011. Archived here. was a New Zealand philatelist who was added to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1978. In 1995 he was awarded the Queen's Service Order for services to philately in New Zealand. McNaught was the Royal Philatelic Society London's special representative for New Zealand. ==References== Category:Signatories to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Category:1913 births Category:1999 deaths Category:New Zealand philatelists Category:Fellows of the Royal Philatelic Society London Category:New Zealand chemists
title: Kenneth J. McNaught
